author: Special Correspondent
text:
Free notebooks and copies of Tirukkural were given away to schoolchildren at Pongal festival organised by Amuthasurabhi Kalai Mandram at the statue of Mother Tamil at Tamukkam here on Friday.

Students worshipped Mother Tamil with lamps. Mayor V.V. Rajan Chellappa and R. Sundararajan, MLA, garlanded the statue on the occasion. V. Balakrishnan, founder of the Mandram, presided.
title: Students get free notebooks
